comments: It was the first garden-tomb on the Indian subcontinent.
Qutb Minar is a 73-metre tall tapering tower of five storeys.
The Red Fort is a historic fort & it was the main residence of the emperors of the Mughal dynasty for nearly 200 years.
The India Gate is a war memorial located astride the Rajpath.
The Lotus Temple India is a Bahá'í House of Worship that was dedicated in December 1986.
The complex displays millennia of traditional Hindu and Indian culture spirituality and architecture.
Connaught Place is a frenetic business and financial hub  centered on a ring of colonnaded Georgian-style buildings with global chain stores vintage cinemas bars and Indian restaurants.
The National Zoological Park is a 176-acre zoo near the Old Fort in Delhi.
Lajpat Nagar is centered on the sprawling Central Market a colorful maze of narrow lanes with stalls and shops selling vivid saris embroidered fabrics kitchenware and herbal cosmetics.
